definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: The countries in the region sign a non-aggression pact.
sentences.chinese: 在该地区的国家签订了一个互不侵犯的条约。

sentences.english: This led to a non-aggression pact between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 这导致了两国间互不侵犯协议的签订。

sentences.english: It is in terms of the non-aggression principle that Rothbard defined anarchism;
sentences.chinese: 罗斯巴德以互不侵犯原则的形式定义了无政府主义。

sentences.english: The two countries made a non-aggression pact.
sentences.chinese: 译两国签署了互不侵犯协定。

sentences.english: Samsung and Apple have traditionally laid off of each other for the most part.
sentences.chinese: 三星和苹果过去在大部分领域一直互不侵犯。

sentences.english: The countries in the region signed a non - aggression pact.
sentences.chinese: 在该地区的国家签订了一个互不侵犯的条约。

definition: peaceful coexistence of nations, societies etc
contract of alliance/oath or treaty between allies

definition: to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
Zhou Enlai's Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence/1954 Panchsheel series of agreements between PRC and India
